block_comment: This block of code performs the function of timing checks for the data strobe signal. Upon detection of a rising edge (positive edge) on the 26th bit of the data strobe input signal 'dqs_in', it calls the 'dqs_neg_timing_check' function with the input parameter '25'. The function specifically ensures timing integrity for data transactions related to this particular bit of the 'dqs_in' signal.
